headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FAIRBAIRN, WILLIAM III

snippet: FAIRBAIRN--William III. The Amateur Comedy Club notes with sorrow the passing of its esteemed senior member, William Fairbairn III on January 10th, 2016. Bill's bold and glowing presence made us merrier and made us better. Deepest condolences to his devoted wife, Ursula. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FAIRBAIRN--William III. The Amateur Comedy Club notes with sorrow the passing of its esteemed senior member, William Fairbairn III on January 10th, 2016. Bill's bold and glowing presence made us merrier and made us better. Deepest condolences to his devoted wife, Ursula. 1/3
